snippet.title: Grit and Valor - 1949 | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Grit and Valor: 1949 is now available on PC (Steam)! Watch the latest trailer for another look at the action-packed gameplay, mechs and setting in this dieselpunk real-time tactics roguelite.

Set in an dieselpunk alternate history where World War 2 rages on, you are the last hope for the resistance. Battle the Evil Axis, fight your way through Europe, and command your elite squadron of mechs to take back the world from the enemy’s grip. Can you make it to machine tower?

Grit and Valor: 1949 is available now on Steam and Steamdeck. Look out for our release to Epic Games Store, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch in summer 2025!
